name: 5agado.github.io
body:
### About Me
Computer Science Student; still trying to understand what is good, bad or better.
Working in improving my programming and developing skills with Java and Python; functional practice with OCaml and Erlang; always opened to eventually-interesting alternatives.

AI and ALife Worshiper, just really waiting to welcome our new robot overlords. Also interested in big-data, graphic programming and service design and engineering.

I am a very pragmatic and concrete person, nevertheless in my spare time I also work as a freelance artist realizing both traditional and digital artworks. 

Additional and less-common interests include lucid dreaming and the overall understanding of the brain, transhumanism,  rhetoric and epistemology. Follower of the [Less Wrong](http://lesswrong.com/) approach to thinking.

### Projects
You can fin most of my public projects in my github account.

### Contact
You can find me on [LinkedIn](http://www.linkedin.com/pub/alex-martinelli/61/b5a/81) and on [StackExchange](http://stackexchange.com/users/1850482/5agado).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
